2022-09-19T00:00:00+01:00.Title: Socks and Shoe Dress Code
2022-09-19T00:00:00+01:00.Paragraph:
This is to notify you that the accepted shoes and socks to be worn by the students/pupils is black shoes and white socks only, with effect from 19th September, 2022. No sandals will be allowed.
We enjoin you to strictly adhere to this information, as whoever fails to comply, will be sent back home immediately.
Therefore, we solicit for your supports to make this a reality.
Thanks for your usual understanding and God bless you.
Management
